title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: Social Issue Exploration and Collaboration Through Hashtag Syllabus Development

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners collect and analyze over 10 resources related to social issues (e.g., ESG, digital transformation) using a hashtag syllabus, demonstrate information literacy by submitting an APA-formatted reference list, and derive a report with three core insights.

Learners engage in weekly group discussions with at least three peers over a six-month collaborative learning process, select two of five complex societal problems (e.g., aging population, ESG management), and produce a team report (3,000 characters) proposing three or more multidimensional solutions.

Learners identify three social issues (e.g., ESG, employee welfare) from real-world corporate environments (manufacturing/service industries), design a syllabus (including learning objectives, assessment criteria, and activity plans) within two weeks, and propose solutions demonstrating over 80% problem-solving efficacy in the final project.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
